title: Group portrait of Westinghouse High School cheerleaders with Prince the mascot dog, front row, left to right; front row: Beverly Wall, Barbara Harrison (Calloway), Belva Stewart, Ruby Brown, "Peppy" the Bulldog [Sandy Bell (or Maxine or Nikki Claybrook)], Sarah Smith (Crable), and Jean Blackwell; back row: Brenda Hartsfield, Ann Flemming (Beulford), Doris Wilson, Sandra Stone, Priscilla Stanton, and Beatrice Ford
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
provenance_text: The Estate of Charles H. Harris, Pittsburgh
